function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited studies comparing human use and biodiversity conservation in green spaces","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on the effect of biodiversity on human health rather than considering both dimensions simultaneously","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impacting people’s lives and businesses","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threats to the validity of energy social science research","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on social science research during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges to validity in research studies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on research validity","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Movement restrictions leading to unemployment","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented national debt from support packages","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-term effects on mental health due to pandemic-related unemployment","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on context in energy social research","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consistent response by social researchers in addressing contagious diseases","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in backgrounds and levels of experience among scholars using social research approaches in energy","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges to the validity of social science energy research presented by the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in prioritizing and justifying measures to account for potential pandemic-related influences","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Constraints such as research plans, budgets, timelines, and labor constraints affecting the ability to address validity challenges","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased burden on research participants due to additional data collection","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential emotional impact of collecting data on sensitive topics heightened by the pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reporting pandemic-related national and local policies during data collection","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to report significant changes in pandemic measures during data collection","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete representation of pandemic severity and its impacts","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diverse impact of pandemic response measures on individuals and households due to local and national policies","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing social and economic inequalities due to the impacts of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in behavior and cognitive dimensions due to covid-19 response measures","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lingering psychological consequences of the covid-19 crisis","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on research design, sample selection, and data collection due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced spurious correlation in non-experimental research","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People required to stay at home leading to higher home energy usage","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased
